description: Alphanumeric code identifying the high-level asset category to which the subtype belongs; used to standardize fleet classification across the system.
Code for the specific asset subtype within an asset_type, used for detailed classification, reporting, and validations; likely part of a composite key with asset_type; confirm with SME.
Human-readable description of the asset subtype, typically detailing body type, configuration, and weight class, used for selection lists and reporting.
Identifier of the user account or automated process that created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created, in system time.
Identifier of the user account or automated process that last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the record.
